question: NBA Playoffs: Thunder vs. Grizzlies (To Advance)
description:
This market refers to the 2025 NBA Western Conference Playoffs First Round matchup between the Oklahoma City Thunder and Memphis Grizzlies.

If the Oklahoma City Thunder advance to the next round of the Western Conference Playoffs, this market will resolve to “Thunder.”

If the Memphis Grizzlies advance to the next round of the Western Conference Playoffs, this market will resolve to “Grizzlies.”

If the series is canceled or postponed beyond May 20, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the NBA.
